sentences.sentence: Nadaq-listed Sina plans to internationalise Weibo in English and has already started by taking it to Japan.
sentences.translation: 在纳斯达克上市的新浪公司计划推出微博英文版并使之国际化，现在公司已经在日本小试牛刀。

sentences.sentence: Many websites are taking the time to internationalise the language of their pages, but have they really thought about the colour?
sentences.translation: 许多网站在页面语言的国际化上下了不少功夫，但他们是否真对颜色有所斟酌呢？

sentences.sentence: Besides, many German workers have faced long wage stagnation. And all the big industrial economies have chosen to internationalise their supply chains.
sentences.translation: 此外，很多德国工人已多年面临薪资停滞，同时所有大型工业经济体都选择将供应链国际化。
